entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generated .deps.json for a resolved package should use path relative to published app layout instead of NuGet package layout #48406
  • [10.0-preview.3] NuGetAuditMode=direct flagging transient vulnerabilities #48391
  • [dotnet test for MTP - Retry] Consider only re-tried test nodes when subtracting failures #48369
    10.0.1xx

Closed

  • `dotnet sln migrate` should take over `.slnLaunch` as `.slnxLaunch` #48014
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48124
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47650
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47641
  • Add support for tool@version to tool install commands #48155
  • could't run dotnet sdk using proot #26650

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce specific test executions times #48405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR vs MSFT signing comparison #48404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SDK-PR-guide.md to include servicing changes to upstream repos #48403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • package-add: Use PackageIdentityArgument #48402
    untriaged
  • Remove the TestSdkRpm #48400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add /t:CompareCliSnapshots and /t:UpdateCliSnapshots #48396
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25210.1 #48395
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for `dotnet file.cs` (without explicit `run` subcommand) #48387
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow sdk binary in the VMR #48382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.2xx #48265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #48267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #48268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sign check to remove the exclusions but only check on sign… #48275
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.105 April 2025 Updates #48274
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop copying PSB reference packages #48397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add synchronize event trigger to pr-analysis.yml #48398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool install/update: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove scenario-tests from Version.Details.xml #48394
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use pull_request_target event for GH Actions workflows #48390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest.10.0.100-Transport package #48388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename DISABLE_CROSSGEN #48389
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #48266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dead code in UsageReport #48359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not build SDK installers in source-build #48322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48329
    untriaged

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #48269
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Support OfficialBuildId for SB #48327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • --interactive should actually default to true in user-facing situations. #48353
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Skip second build if possible with 'dotnet run file' #48318
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Switch to using `darc vmr forwardflow` #48351
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • [StaticWebAssets] Rename WriteImportMapToHtml to OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders #48312
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Promote `NuGet.Client` builds during official CI #48311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
